componentes

Class MinHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • componentes.MinHash

  • public class MinHash
extends java.lang.Object
    MinHash é um esquema de hashing que produz assinaturas semelhantes para sets semelhantes. Implementação baseada no artigo MinHash Tutorial with Python Code de Chris McCormick Encontrado em http://mccormickml.com/2015/06/12/minhash-tutorial-with-python-code/

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MinHash(int signatureSize)
      Class Constructor for Counting Bloom Filter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateSimilarity(int[] signature1, int[] signature2)
      Method to calculate similarity between 2 Minhash signatures
      static double distanciaJaccard(java.util.Set A, java.util.Set B) 
      double erro()
      Method to calculate MinHash error, with the formula 1/sqrt(signatureSize) For a smaller error, the Signature Size/Number of Hashes has to be bigger For 10% it's 100 hashes, for 1% is no more than 10000 hash functions!
      long[][] getCoeficientes()
      Getter method for hash coefs
      int[] getSignature(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> toSign)
      Method to calculate MinHash Signature of a given set.
      static double indiceJaccard(java.util.Set A, java.util.Set B)
      Auxiliary method to calculate Jaccard Index, can be used to check MinHash results
      static java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.Integer> shingleTextPairs(java.lang.String toShingle)
      Method to shingle a String in pairs of 2 characters.

        public double calculateSimilarity(int[] signature1,
                                  int[] signature2)
        Method to calculate similarity between 2 Minhash signatures
        Parameters:
        signature1 - Signature of first set.
        signature2 - Signature of second set.
        Returns:
        Similarity between the 2 signatures.

        coeficientes

      • getSignature

        public int[] getSignature(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> toSign)
        Method to calculate MinHash Signature of a given set. Converts set to ArrayList and hashes each int, getting the minimum value
        Parameters:
        toSign - Set to sign
        Returns:
        Hash Signature of given set

      • shingleTextPairs

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.Integer> shingleTextPairs(java.lang.String toShingle)
        Method to shingle a String in pairs of 2 characters.
        Parameters:
        toShingle - String to shingle.
        Returns:
        Set with shingles

      • erro

        public double erro()
        Method to calculate MinHash error, with the formula 1/sqrt(signatureSize) For a smaller error, the Signature Size/Number of Hashes has to be bigger For 10% it's 100 hashes, for 1% is no more than 10000 hash functions!
        Returns:
        Error value.

      • indiceJaccard

        public static double indiceJaccard(java.util.Set A,
                                   java.util.Set B)
        Auxiliary method to calculate Jaccard Index, can be used to check MinHash results
        Parameters:
        A - Set A
        B - Set B
        Returns:
        Jaccard's index

        public static double distanciaJaccard(java.util.Set A,
                                      java.util.Set B)
